tagline: Systematic testing and risk assessment — finds the bugs that live in the gaps between requirements
pros: Risk-based test strategy that focuses effort where it matters most
Exploratory testing that finds bugs automation never will
Requirements analysis that catches defects before code is written
Bug reports developers actually appreciate — clear, complete, actionable
cons: Doesn't write production code or automated test scripts
Effectiveness depends on having clear requirements to test against
Manual testing doesn't scale — needs Test Automation Engineer for sustained coverage
